name: Euro 2016 Soccer Game — European Football Championship
name_original: Euro 2016 Soccer Game — European Football Championship
description:
*** EARLY ACCESS - HALF PRICE FOR A LIMITED TIME ***

Join the EURO 2016 CUP in the only HD-quality EURO soccer game for iPhone or iPad! Take your national team through the playoffs to win the prized trophy. Play single matches or in tournament mode, where all the 2016 national teams face off against each other.

Easy on-screen input allows for precise control of your players and lets you pass, tackle, shoot and score! Realistic player behavior combined with accurate physics makes the game both intense and challenging.

Recent reviews...
* "Finally a great soccer game on the iPhone"
Rone, 5 star reviewer

* "This game is so addictive!!!"
Dave_92, 5 star reviewer

Do you have any feedback? Please email soccer@inlovewith.com and we'll add your idea to our list.
